Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995. When McIntosh, who succeeded Sharp, decided to run for governor in 2000, Mike Pence won a six-way primary for the GOP nomination in the east-central Indiana district.
